edu.ucla.sspace.evaluation
Class ToeflSynonymEvaluation

java.lang.Object
  edu.ucla.sspace.evaluation.ToeflSynonymEvaluation
All Implemented Interfaces:
WordChoiceEvaluation
public class ToeflSynonymEvaluation
extends Object
implements WordChoiceEvaluation

A test of eighty synonym questions gathered from the Test of English as a Foreign Langauge (TOEFL) exam gathered by Thomas Landauer. See

  • Landauer, T. K., and Dumais, S. T. (1997). A solution to Plato's problem: The Latent Semantic Analysis theory of the acquisition, induction, and representation of knowledge. Psychological Review, 104, 211-240. (Available here)
for details on the test.

See Also:
ESLSynonymEvaluation

answerFileName - the name of the file that contains the answers to the TOEFL questions
